mapper.update: update cart set cart_product_quantity = cart_product_quantity + 1 where customer_id=#{customerId} and product_id=#{productId} and option_size = #{optionSize} and option_frame = #{optionFrame}
update cart set cart_product_quantity = cart_product_quantity - 1 where customer_id=#{customerId} and product_id=#{productId} and option_size = #{optionSize} and option_frame = #{optionFrame}
